job_title: Senior Sales and Business Development Manager
job_description:
At Mindojo , we’re developing an adaptive education platform used by market-leading test-prep courses such as Bloomberg Exam Prep. Recently we began developing a sophisticated app offering a powerful set of learning games for kids learning English as a second language (ESL), targeting ~1B kids world wide. The app is still in an early beta but already has 1M+ downloads (see “Plingo” on Google Play).

In the Senior Sales and Business Development Manager role you’ll be responsible for increasing the number of outbound activities with the purpose of scheduling meetings with potential clients, negotiating and closing deals. Your work will focus on one or both of:

- B2B deals for our adaptive online training platform

- B2G deals for our English as Second Language product for schools

Other duties may include developing business strategies and pitches, managing a variety of projects, and identifying new business opportunities. You’ll closely interact with product and project managers and report directly to the CEO.

We offer a full-time or part-time contract role. You can work from wherever you wish and the work schedule is very flexible.
• *Our culture**

We believe in minimum bureaucracy and maximum creative freedom. Our team members enjoy lots of autonomy and are measured mostly by their actual deliverables. We work hard (who’s not familiar with healthy deadlines?) but are happy knowing that our efforts will help improve the lives of many and help the global economy at large. We love people who can approach problems from different angles and who are comfortable asking tough questions and proposing innovative solutions. We aren’t afraid to switch to new technologies as soon as it makes sense, and as a consequence, much of our stack is always at the cutting edge. We’re continuously looking for ways to improve our processes, and everyone’s suggestions are heard and considered on their merit, not based on seniority.
• *Requirements**

- 6+ years of relevant work experience as Sales Manager, SDR with ability to close, or Business Development in B2B SaaS companies

- Proven track record of achieving goals

- Demonstration of strong interpersonal skills with the ability to engage effectively with various levels of management, staff, and clients

- Excellent presentation skills and the ability to effectively articulate our value proposition

- Excellent organizational skills and a proactive attitude are essential

- General tech savviness

- Fluent English, oral and written, is a must
• *Bonus points for:**

- Masters degree in Business Management, Marketing, or related field

- Experience with Education services / EdTech
• *What you will be doing:**

- Reach out to prospects through various channels (following Mindojo Sales playbook ) in order to schedule meetings and signing new clients.

- Manage a pipeline of qualified opportunities.

- Collect and maintain prospect information in the CRM database.

- Develop a positive relationship with key client decision-makers

- Negotiate and close deals
• *What we offer:**

- Competitive compensation

- Energetic, knowledgeable, and friendly small team

- Challenging and interesting projects

- Stock option plan

- Company-sponsored events and educational programs

- Flexible work schedule and ability to work from anywhere

- Last, but not least: a real chance to play a key part in revolutionizing education worldwide

Looking forward to discussing this position with you,

The Mindojo Team
